headline: Collaboration at Scale: Unlocking Flexibility for Energy Optimization
summary: As technology continues to transform our economy, flexibility and collaboration across the energy sector will drive efficiency and resilience. NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / December 11, 2025 / Trane Technologies This article is co-authored by ...

headline: ‘2026 Year Ahead’: Bank of America Picks 2 Stocks to Buy as the Market Moves from Hype to Earnings
summary: The countdown to the new year has begun, and Wall Street is already planning its next chapter. Major institutions and top-tier analysts are sketching out their playbooks for the year ahead – and after a strong run in the markets, these forecasts are shaping how investors prepare their next moves. Enter Savita Subramanian, Bank of America’s equity and quant strategist.
